study_plan_entry.title: Design and analysis of experiments in materials science and engineering

free_text.Note: Intensive one-week course. MS Excel spreadsheets used for practical work
free_text.Bibliography and material: Reference book: D.C. Montgomery “Design and Analysis of Experiments” Wiley & Sons, NY.
free_text.Required prior knowledge: Basic statistics and materials science, MS Excel[br/]
free_text.Content: Introduction: [br/][li]Experimental system; inputs and outputs; factors; treatments; tests; experience[br/][li]Optimization; problem solving[br/][br/]Refreshment of basic statistics: [br/][li]Descriptive statistics (statistical population, sampling, mean, standard deviation, standard distribution)[br/][li]Hypothesis testing (Type I and type II error risks)[br/][li]Statistical tests (Student's t-test, F- test, Khi-2 test)[br/][br/]Simple comparison designs:[br/][li]Comparing two data sets: differences between means, variance ratios[br/][li]Sensitivity and power: how many tests are required ?[br/][li]Randomization: how to prevent systematic effects of parasitic factors ?[br/][br/]Single factor designs:[br/][li]Statistical model[br/][li]Analysis of variance (ANOVA)[br/][li]Model adequacy checking (residuals analysis)[br/][li]Fully randomized vs randomized complete block designs[br/][li]Choice of sample size[br/][br/]Multifactorial designs:[br/][li]Main factor effects, interactions[br/][li]2k factorial designs[br/][li]Single replica of multifactorial designs[br/][li]Partial multifactorial designs[br/][br/]Case studies:[br/][li]Building materials, metals and alloys, ceramics, composites [br/][li]Biomaterials (in vitro, in vivo and clinical experiments)  [br/]
free_text.Keywords: DOE, ANOVA, statistical analysis, experimental methodology
free_text.Learning outcomes: Provide the student with the skills and tools necessary for a wise and efficient orgqnization of his-her experimental work in all fields of materials science and technology (development, processing and caracterization of materials)

en.title: Design and analysis of experiments in materials science and engineering
en.library_recommends: • "Design and analysis of experiments / Douglas C. Montgomery". Year:2009. ISBN:978-0-470-39882-1

fr.title: Design and analysis of experiments in materials science and engineering
fr.library_recommends: • "Design and analysis of experiments / Douglas C. Montgomery". Année:2009. ISBN:978-0-470-39882-1
